tech_news.title: Is it really possible to 'bank' sleep for later? - BBC
tech_news.description: From helping you to focus more to improving sports performance, some scientists believe 'depositing' sleep for later use can bring a range of benefits.

tech_news.title: The Reason Why OLED TVs Are So Expensive - bgr.com
tech_news.description: OLED TVs are more expensive due to how they are manufactured, the materials used, and the size they are made in. Additional tech features can also raise costs.

tech_news.description: The variety of gadgets that are compatible with your car's USB port is vast, but mini fridges and portable humidifiers should be on everyone's short list.

tech_news.title: PlayStation Plus Users Have 72 Hours to Get $170 Worth of PS5 Games for Free - ComicBook.com
tech_news.description: PlayStation Plus users have roughly 72 hours to get $170 worth of PS5 games for free before each game reverts back to its normal price.
